name: Dokingdom
description:
Hi and welcome to the demo of Dokingdom!

In this tactical turn based RPG, you are the Defenders of Kingdom, also called the DoK, a group of elite soldiers fighting for people in crisis situations.

An infection called the Plague has appeared and has already affected thousands of people, turning them into uncontrollable mutants. 

In response to this situation, 2 groups of people want to fight the plague in different ways :
-   the Saviours, trying to find a cure
-   the Dissidents, killing every single people showing any sign of possible infection

The king called upon you to stop the actions of the Dissidents, find and kill their leader.

But everything is not that simple, and nothing will happen as planned. Learn more about the origins of the plague, track the dissidents, and survive to the threat of mutants on your way.

Build and optimize your team, anticipate the next turns as in a chess game and master the positioning.

This demo is mostly  focused on the gameplay of Dokingdom. Many more things will come later on.

You can join the Discord to participate to the development by sharing your ideas : https://discord.gg/z6vSDaX

Character design by Aekashics
